item.description: from the event page: "1st general assembly for occupy boston. we, the 99% demand an end to all this injustice and corporate greed! come and participate have your voice heard. this is a leaderless movement, that preaches above all, participatory democracy & non-violence!! " https://www.facebook.... even if it becomes nothing, let's bring our hearts and peacefully voice our objections to these tyrannical machinations by this fascist system which threatens to imprison future generations in infinite servitude

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: Occupy Boston - 1st Boston general assembly
